attributes.action: Open up Dubai as a Green list travel corridor
attributes.additional_details: The UAE should be added to the UK Travel Corridor. Using reasons of it being a "travel hub" are not a valid reason, when our own Heathrow airport is a major world hub.
attributes.background: There are 250,000 UK citizens living in the UAE. Anyone arriving from the UAE to the UK must isolate for 10 days in a Government Hotel paying £1750. Currently Covid cases have fallen and are low, plus the vaccine roll out is greater than the UK success.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575787
